doc.after: Massachusetts has contributed to American arts and culture Drawing from its Native American and Yankee roots along with later immigrant groups Massachusetts has produced a number of writers artists and musicians A number of major museums and important historical sites are also located there and events and festivals throughout the year celebrate the state s history and heritage 265
